title: GEOLOGIC AND AEROMAGNETIC MAP OF THE CHAMA - SOUTHERN SAN JUAN MOUNTAINS WILDERNESS STUDY AREA AND VICINITY , MINERAL , RIO GRANDE , CONEJOS , AND ARCHULETA COUNTIES , COLORADO
publisher: United States Department of the Interior Geological Survey
base_map: U.S. Geological Survey 1:62,500: Platoro, 1967; Wolf Creek Pass, Chromo, Chama Peak, 1957; 1:24,000: Red Mountain (advance copy); Spectacle Lake, Cumbres, 1967
